summary: Professor Wassermann is asked by industry magnate Morgan Hunnicut to lead an expedition to study the giant Yeti creature found frozen in a large ice block.
cast: Antonella Interlenghi|Mimmo Crao|Jim Sullivan|Tony Kendall|Edoardo Faieta|John Stacy|Stelio Candelli|Loris Bazzocchi|Donald O'Brien|Aldo Canti|Francesco D'Adda|Giuseppe Mattei|Claudio Zucchet|Stefano Cedrati|Agostino Scuderi|Luciano Zanussi
title: Yeti: El abominable hombre de las nieves
